scripts.postinstall: mkdir public && mkdir public/css && mkdir public/js && mkdir public/js/ie
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run copy-files & http-server -c-1 public
scripts.css: npm run cssmain && npm run cssie8 && npm run cssie9
scripts.build: npm run html & npm run js & npm run css & npm run images & npm run copy-files
scripts.watch: npm run watch-html & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-images
scripts.copy-files: cp -R assets/asciinema public/asciinema & cp assets/js/ie/* public/js/ie/ & cp -R assets/js/vendor/* public/js
scripts.deploy-import: npm run pre-deploy && git checkout gh-pages-develop -- public && mv public/* ./ && rm -rf public
scripts.deploy-push: git add -A && git commit -m 'Deploy website' && git push && git checkout gh-pages-develop
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-import && npm run deploy-push
